headline: Cost of Grounding Boeing 737 Max: Over $18 Billion
abstract: The grounding of the 737 Max jet continues to drag on the companyâ€™s results.
lead_paragraph: Boeing said on Wednesday that the costs associated with the grounding of the 737 Max were likely to surpass $18 billion, a significant increase over earlier forecasts.
keywords: Boeing 737 Max Groundings and Safety Concerns (2019)
